CustomField.description: Checked to shift dates and times in the record by minutes, unchecked to adjust by whole days instead (e.g., tasks due and calendar events should shift by whole days).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Checked to shift dates and times in the record by minutes, unchecked to adjust by whole days instead (e.g., tasks due and calendar events should shift by whole days).
CustomField.label: Adjust Minutes
